name: Into the Toybox
description:
Into the Toybox is a short visual novel about loss and grief, created by a small group of Creative Writing and Games Art students. 

Features

  • Lasts around 15-30 minutes.
  • A cute and simplistic art style. 
  • Multiple choices.

The Art Team

Warning!

The mac version of Into the Toybox is something we had to upload for our University submission, however it has not been play tested. We recommend that you play the Windows/Linux versions instead if you can.
